a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Mean adult height by year of birth, males vs. females, 1996
Mean height for adult men versus adult women by year of birth i.e. data for 1996 is for men and women who were 18 years old in 2014.
Data source: NCD RisC, Human Height (2017)
